Data Fields
crc_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Cyclic Redundancy Check (CRC)

CRC Attributes. More...

#include <crc.h>

Detailed Description

This data structure defines the structure used with I_CRC_SETATTR ioctl requests on the RTC. It is also used when opening the RTC.

Data Fields

u32 o_flags
 
u32 freq
 

Field Documentation

◆ freq

u32 crc_attr_t::freq

Calibration frequency for setting the pre-scalar

◆ o_flags

u32 crc_attr_t::o_flags

Bitmask for setting attributes
